name: saltine
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small, thin, hard savoury biscuit: The only thing we had to eat on the boat was saltines. I bought a box of saltine crackers.
Garrett Aitken/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesSaltines were available to cleanse the palate. Serve this dish with a side of saltine crackers topped with a spread of real butter.The circuit board was as small as a saltine cracker.
